text: Va ʙe tardid, ʙisjore az çinnijon va odamijonro ʙaroi duzax ofaridaem, [caro ki] dilhoe dorand, ki ʙo onho [haqoiqro] dark namekunand va caşmone dorand, ki ʙo onho [nişonahoi tavonu tadʙiri ilohiro] nameʙinand va gūşhoe dorand, ki ʙo onho [suxanoni haqro] nameşunavand. Onon hamcun cahorpojonand, ʙalki [az onho ham] gumrohtarand. [Ore] Ononand,ki [az oxirat] ƣofiland
